movies.title: Wonder Woman 1984
movies.discription: In 1984, after saving the world in Wonder Woman (2017), the immortal Amazon warrior, Princess Diana of Themyscira, finds herself trying to stay under the radar, working as an archaeologist at the Smithsonian Museum. With the memory of the brave U.S. pilot, Captain Steve Trevor, etched on her mind, Diana Prince becomes embroiled in a sinister conspiracy of global proportions when a transparent, golden-yellow citrine gemstone catches the eye of the power-hungry entrepreneur, Maxwell Lord.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
movies.discription: The history of the Skywalker family is rapidly approaching the finale. These people did a lot for their people, entered into open confrontation with the enemy and tried to protect the Universe from insidious invaders, but now the place of defenders will have to be replaced by other, younger and braver characters who are ready to perform heroic deeds. A young girl named Rey decided to continue the dangerous and responsible mission of the fearless Luke. He gave her many instructions before leaving, and these greatly facilitated her path of ascent. The girl was able to become a unique Jedi, discovered a lot of new abilities in herself, and only she is able to influence the outcome of the battle.

movies.title: Aquaman
movies.discription: Arthur never considered himself an ordinary teenager. Curry possessed incredible strength, speed, breathed easily under water, and also understood the language of underwater creatures. These abilities madly frightened the boy, but he did not tell anyone about them. Didn't mean to seem weird. The boy's mother was very ill. Once a woman told him about who he really is. It turned out that Arthur was half-human, half-Atlantean, heir to the sea throne. After the death of his mother, his father began to prepare his son for the ascension to the throne. Time does not stand still, a teenager turns into an adult man. The prince is going to take back what is rightfully his.

movies.title: The Joker
movies.discription: Arthur Fleck had long wanted to realize himself in a more promising place, so he left Gotham. He has an unconventional sense of humor, so he dreamed of becoming a professional comedian who would conquer thousands of fans of the uneasy genre. But several persistent efforts of the comedian to achieve recognition of society ended in failure. Not so long ago, the main character found out that his mother had a terrible disease, and he needed to return to his native land as soon as possible. The city where the man spent his childhood has changed a lot, it is almost unrecognizable. Everything began to be controlled by criminal authorities, they set their own rules by which people have to live.

movies.title: Bumblebee
movies.discription: Beginning of 1987. Hoping to break away from his pursuers, Bumblebee lands on Earth. However, on an alien planet, he is met with indifference. Hit by the military, the hero loses part of his memory and, before turning off the power, scans the yellow Volkswagen Beetle standing nearby and, having assumed the image, transforms into it.

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.discription: Aladdin is an orphaned street urchin living in the city of Agrabah. One day, he meets Princess Jasmine, walking incognito because her overprotective father won't let her leave the palace. The boy uses his sleight of hand and thief skills to infiltrate the palace, surprising his new girlfriend, but it's these abilities that catch the attention of Jafar, the Sultan's ambitious advisor. The Vizier kidnaps Aladdin and takes him to the Cave of Wonders, where he orders him to get a simple lamp in exchange for wealth. This is how the thief meets the magical Genie, imprisoned in a lamp, who can grant three wishes.

movies.title: Jurassic World
movies.discription: Before leaving the world, the famous John Hammond left his scientific pride to one famous millionaire, Simon Masrani, who was passionate about everything related to science. Having become the full owner of the park with dinosaurs, the new owner divided it into two parts. Wild species lived in the first, and trained and domesticated reptiles lived in the second, which were the main attraction of the entertainment center for children and adults. But, as time went on, interest in prehistoric creatures fell, and the park ceased to bring financial profit to the businessman, which prompted Simon to artificially bring out a new exhibit - the most dangerous and bloodthirsty dinosaur Indominius Rex.

movies.title: The Witches
movies.discription: Witches exist. They are among people, carefully disguised. Distinguished by diabolical cunning, cunning and meanness, these evil creatures also madly hate children. In 1960, a witch meeting takes place in one of the resorts in Alabama. The Supreme Witch creates a witchcraft potion, after drinking which a person becomes an irreversible mouse. She longs to cleanse the earth from the children she hates, so she develops an insidious plan: mix this drug into sweets that kids love so much and distribute them to all the kids. But a little boy accidentally learns about her plans. Together with his energetic grandmother and new friends, he blocks the way for evil and deceit.

movies.title: Dolittle
movies.discription: Seven years ago, Doctor Dolittle lost the meaning of life. His wife went on a journey and never returned. Previously, a man actively helped animals and people. After the tragedy, everything changed. Doolittle became a recluse. Perhaps he would have lived like this for many more years, but the doctor had to pull himself together. The Queen is seriously hurt. Only he can save her from certain death. Doolittle decides to face the ordeal. The life of the ruler of the country is in his hands. Will the doctor be able to find an antidote and help his old friend, or is she doomed to a painful death? Friends of the protagonist, animals, will not leave him in trouble!

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.discription: The incredible power of Thanos, destroying everything in its path, began to incinerate the resources of the Earth. Initially, the antagonist set a specific goal and practically achieved it, because half of all life on the planet was defeated, and the survivors are now waiting for the inevitable moment when they die. The moment has come when the only and decisive battle is able to stop the villain or destroy the chances of mankind for survival. A brave team of Avengers must gather for a fierce battle.
